statements: SELECT * FROM ridership_data WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT rider_id, date, boarding_time FROM ridership_data WHERE route_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM ridership_data WHERE alighting_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT rider_id, route_id, date FROM ridership_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(boarding_time) AS latest_boarding_time FROM ridership_data WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT rider_id, route_id, date, boarding_time, alighting_time FROM ridership_data WHERE rider_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, boarding_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT rider_id, route_id FROM ridership_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' GROUP BY rider_id ORDER BY route_id
SELECT * FROM ridership_data WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND date > '2022-03-01' AND boarding_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT rider_id, route_id, date FROM ridership_data WHERE route_id = 2 AND date < '2022-02-15' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT route_id, AVG(boarding_time) AS avg_boarding_time, MIN(alighting_time) AS min_alighting_time FROM ridership_data GROUP BY route_id HAVING AVG(boarding_time) > '10:00:00' ORDER BY avg_boarding_time DESC
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_rating FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_rating FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM trips;
SELECT rider_name, start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM riders JOIN trips ON riders.rider_id = trips.rider_id;
SELECT * FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT rider_name, rider_rating FROM riders ORDER BY rider_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT rider_name, COUNT(trip_id) AS total_trips FROM riders JOIN trips ON riders.rider_id = trips.rider_id GROUP BY riders.rider_id;
SELECT AVG(rider_rating) AS avg_rating, MAX(rider_rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rider_rating) AS lowest_rating FROM riders;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_age FROM riders ORDER BY rider_age DESC;
SELECT rider_name, rider_location FROM riders WHERE rider_age > 25;
SELECT rider_name, ride_distance FROM riders JOIN rides ON riders.rider_id = rides.rider_id;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_age FROM riders WHERE rider_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM rides ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT rider_name, ride_date, ride_distance FROM riders JOIN rides ON riders.rider_id = rides.rider_id;
SELECT start_location, end_location, route_distance FROM routes WHERE route_distance > 10 ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, ride_count FROM riders;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rider_id, rider_name, rider_location FROM riders;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location='City A';
SELECT rider_name, COUNT(ride_count) AS total_rides FROM riders GROUP BY rider_name;
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_id, rider_name FROM riders;
SELECT rider_id, rider_name, rider_email FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rides ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM routes WHERE route_distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_email FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE ride_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ride_distance DESC;
SELECT r.rider_name, rt.route_name, rd.ride_date FROM riders r JOIN rides rd ON r.rider_id = rd.rider_id JOIN routes rt ON rd.route_id = rt.route_id;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, s.day_of_week, s.departure_time FROM schedules s JOIN vehicles v ON s.route_id = v.route_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday';
